programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: When a mining accident kills wealthy cattle rancher Sam Magruder and injures Cheyenne, another man assumes Magruder's identity. Cheyenne is suspicious and takes on a job on his ranch to investigate.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne meets a tough as nails rancher who hires him as a foreman. He soon faces hostility from fellow ranch employees and the rancher, who has a firm grip on his land, the town, and his handicapped daughter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger and Cody struggle to pen two bulls in need of a veterinary check-up. Cody gets soaked when he fails to heed Booger's prediction of a rainstorm, sparking Booger to try his hand at delivering the local weather forecast. Bubba decides to accept the job with his father-in-law in Mississippi and he makes a handmade gift for Cody and Booger to soften the blow when he breaks the news to them. The trio takes on one last big job to benefit a neighbor in need. Bubba and Kaley host a final cookout before they pack up and leave for Mississippi.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's time for the cowboys to ride into new pastures as they explore growing their cattle business in unexpected ways. Bubba has been making good money working for his father-in-law's company in Mississippi, but he realizes he'd rather be out of his office chair and back on his horse in Alabama. Cody is excited to be managing a big rodeo, but a steer mishap puts the future of his contract on the ropes. And, even though Booger has happily saddled up with Jaclyn, it's unfamiliar terrain for him when she starts adding a woman's touch to his bachelor pad. As the three cowboys get together to sort yearlings for a friend, they devise a plan for making BBQ sauce to expand their cooking skills and company.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch
programme.desc: When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.sub-title: William Bartram: America's First Great Naturalist
programme.desc: Naturalist William Bartram explores the unmapped regions of the South to document the native fauna and flora. After surviving many encounters with Native Americans and wildlife, it's an invisible virus that may finally end the journey and his life.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: With only four cowboys left, Trace raises the stakes by taking away the chance to win immunity from elimination. At this point, one mistake can cost any of them the competition. A series of challenges test the remaining contestants on their mastery of essential cowboy skills: horsemanship, roping, and cattle handling. One of the top competitors delivers less-than-perfect results for the first time and misses the mark during a steer-roping challenge. When tending to the cattle, two of the contestants' lack of experience comes to light, putting the health of the herd at risk. One of the competitors uses his experience as a cow boss and takes control of the group challenge. The other cowboys question his direction, unsure if his tactics will be successful. Trace makes a tough decision and sends someone packing.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Van Dorn, a corrupt businessman and the man responsible for the murder of Marshal Sam Cain's wife, comes to Sweetwater. First, he ousts Cain and takes over the town, and then he appoints his gang to be the law enforcement for the town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: When a mining accident kills wealthy cattle rancher Sam Magruder and injures Cheyenne, another man assumes Magruder's identity. Cheyenne is suspicious and takes on a job on his ranch to investigate.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne meets a tough as nails rancher who hires him as a foreman. He soon faces hostility from fellow ranch employees and the rancher, who has a firm grip on his land, the town, and his handicapped daughter.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger and Cody team up to pen a herd of cattle, but a stubborn cow takes refuge in a fishing hole, requiring some creative wrangling. The stress of maintaining a long-distance relationship leads Bubba and Kaley to move back to Alabama for good. Booger embraces his new role as a family man and enlists young Matthew to help surprise Jaclyn with a much needed home-improvement project. Cody helps Misty throw a beef-tasting party for potential buyers. As the guys ponder using their cowboy skills to open a steak house, they decide to get some on-the-job training by working a shift during the hectic dinner rush at a local eatery.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Bubba's back in the saddle with the guys when his horse bucks and throws him on a bone-breaking fall, fractures his cowboy spirit and immobilizes his work with the cattle company. Booger enlists a bullfighter to help him wrangle his ornery Brahman cattle, and considers whether or not he has enough land to maintain the growing herd. Misty gives Cody a gift from the heart that captures both their past as a couple and honors their growing family legacy as ranchers. The guys pitch each other competing ideas for their future steakhouse, and Cody's brainstorm stands out as the one with true cowboy vision - including a name for their venture.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.sub-title: Short Rope for a Tall Man
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark travel to a nearby town to sell a bull. While in town, they buy two horses from Mr. Schneider, a man in a hurry. When a posse stops Lucas and Mark on the way home, Lucas learns the horses were stolen. The men want Lucas to hang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Clarence Bibs, a simple-minded man, fancies himself as a gunfighter. While practicing, he falls and his gun fires, killing a famous gunslinger. The man's partner comes to town wanting revenge.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When Bronco Bill and his gang are robbing trains at will, two veteran lawmen join forces to stop the violent outlaws once and for all. Years later, gunfighter-turned-reporter Bat Masterson hears the story from the last surviving member of the gang.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: After being sworn in as one of Oklahoma's first female deputy marshals, Ada Curnutt volunteers to track down two killers-turned-counterfeiters and concocts a cunning plan to bring them to justice without using a gun.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone faces the biggest challenge of his life when the Shawnee take him prisoner. He must find a way to escape and travel 160 miles through hostile territory to warn Boonesborough, and his family, of a looming attack.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: The three remaining cowboys go head-to-head in a dramatic final showdown to prove they have more heart, grit, and cowboy skills than their fellow competitors. In the arena, the cowboys are tested individually on roping and reining. The extremely technical challenge puts the contestants on edge. An impressive performance by one of the competitors sets the bar high for the rest of the cowboys. Out in the field, the contestants have to work together as a team in their last challenge. The cowboys must successfully drive a herd through a grueling three-mile journey of pastures and pines, navigating multiple obstacles throughout the way. Feeling the pressure to win, bad communication puts the herd in a dangerous situation when a group of their cattle wanders onto a busy road. Trace spends one-on-one time with the remaining cowboys, evaluates their performances throughout the competition, and names the first-ever winner of the Ultimate Cowboy Showdown.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Teaspoon travels to Texas with an old comrade to warn three aging veterans that someone has been murdering the last men who genuinely remember the Alamo. Jimmy and Buck follow from behind as Teaspoon tracks down the killer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.
